00063 template <class T>
00064 class Array1D 
00065 {
00066 
00067 
00068   private:
00069     T* v_;                  
00070     int n_;
00071     int *ref_count_;
00072 
00073         void initialize_(int n);
00074     void copy_(T* p, const T*  q, int len) const;
00075     void set_(const T& val);
00076     void destroy_();
00077         inline const T* begin_() const;
00078         inline T* begin_();
00079 
00080   public:
00081 
00082     typedef         T   value_type;
00083 
00084                  Array1D();

00086                  Array1D(int n,  T *a);
00087                  Array1D(int n, const T &a);

00109 template <class T>
00110 Array1D<T>::Array1D() : v_(0), n_(0), ref_count_(0) 
00111 {
00112         ref_count_ = new int;
00113         *ref_count_ = 1;
00114 }

00122 template <class T>
00123 Array1D<T>::Array1D(const Array1D<T> &A) : v_(A.v_),  
00124         n_(A.n_), ref_count_(A.ref_count_)
00125 {
00126         (*ref_count_)++;
00127 }

00162         ref_count_(0)

00180 template <class T>
00181 Array1D<T>::Array1D(int n, T *a) : v_(a), n_(n) ,
00182         ref_count_(0)
00183 {
00184         ref_count_ = new int;
00185         *ref_count_ = 2;                /* this avoid destorying original data. */
00186 
00187 }

00194 template <class T>
00195 inline T& Array1D<T>::operator[](int i) 
00196 { 
00197 #ifdef TNT_BOUNDS_CHECK
00198         assert(i>= 0);
00199         assert(i < n_);
00200 #endif
00201         return v_[i];

00234 template <class T>
00235 Array1D<T> Array1D<T>::copy() const
00236 {
00237         Array1D A( n_);
00238         copy_(A.begin_(), begin_(), n_);
00239 
00240         return A;

00267 template <class T>
00268 Array1D<T> & Array1D<T>::inject(const Array1D &A)
00269 {
00270         if (A.n_ == n_)
00271                 copy_(begin_(), A.begin_(), n_);
00272 
00273         return *this;
00274 }

00290 template <class T>
00291 Array1D<T> & Array1D<T>::ref(const Array1D<T> &A)
00292 {
00293         if (this != &A)
00294         {
00295                 (*ref_count_) --;
00296                 if ( *ref_count_ < 1)
00297                 {
00298                         destroy_();
00299                 }
00300 
00301                 n_ = A.n_;
00302                 v_ = A.v_;
00303                 ref_count_ = A.ref_count_;
00304 
00305                 (*ref_count_) ++ ;
00306                 
00307         }
00308         return *this;
00309 }
00310 
00314 template <class T>
00315 Array1D<T> & Array1D<T>::operator=(const Array1D<T> &A)
00316 {
00317         return ref(A);
00318 }

00324 template <class T>
00325 inline int Array1D<T>::dim1() const { return n_; }

00331 template <class T>
00332 inline int Array1D<T>::dim() const { return n_; }

00340 template <class T>
00341 inline int Array1D<T>::ref_count() const
00342 {
00343         return *ref_count_;
00344 }
00345 
00346 template <class T>
00347 Array1D<T>::~Array1D()
00348 {
00349         (*ref_count_) --;
00350 
00351         if (*ref_count_ < 1)
00352                 destroy_();
00353 }

00357 template <class T>
00358 void Array1D<T>::initialize_(int n)
00359 {
00360 
00361 
00362         v_ = new T[n];
00363         n_ = n;
00364 }
00365 
00366 template <class T>
00367 void Array1D<T>::set_(const T& a)
00368 {
00369         T *begin = &(v_[0]);
00370         T *end = begin+ n_;
00371 
00372         for (T* p=begin; p<end; p++)
00373                 *p = a;
00374 
00375 }
00376 
00377 template <class T>
00378 void Array1D<T>::copy_(T* p, const T* q, int len) const
00379 {
00380         T *end = p + len;
00381         while (p<end )
00382                 *p++ = *q++;
00383 
00384 }
00385 
00386 template <class T>
00387 void Array1D<T>::destroy_()
00388 {
00389 
00390         if (v_ != 0)
00391         {
00392                 delete[] (v_);
00393         }
00394 
00395         if (ref_count_ != 0)
00396                 delete ref_count_;
00397 }

00402 template <class T>
00403 const T* Array1D<T>::begin_() const { return &(v_[0]); }
00404 
00408 template <class T>
00409 T* Array1D<T>::begin_() { return &(v_[0]); }
